text: The Jewel Box Cluster or Kappa Crucis cluster is a star cluster over 6,000 light years away in the constellation, Crux (the southern cross).http://www.univie.ac.at/webda/cgi-bin/ocl_page.cgi?dirname=ngc4755 It has many blue supergiant stars, and one red supergiant, DU Crucis. == References == Category:Star clusters
title: Jewel Box Cluster
